product.title: Hand Soap Duo Refills Subscription
product.body_html:
Now you'll never run out of tablets to go with your Hand Soap Duo.

Your subscription includes:
2 foaming soap tablets in Iris Agave
2 foaming soap tablets in Perrine Lemon
2 foaming soap tablets in Lavender Eucalyptus

Delivered at a frequency of your choice. Pause, skip or cancel anytime.

images.alt: Six hand soap tablets three unwrapped and three in wrappers in three scents, Iris Agave, Perrine Lemon and Lavender Eucalyptus

image.alt: Six hand soap tablets three unwrapped and three in wrappers in three scents, Iris Agave, Perrine Lemon and Lavender Eucalyptus

metafields.value:
Made without any triclosan, parabens, phosphates, phthlates, ammonia, or VOCs. Certified Platinum Material Health by Cradle to Cradle, Leaping Bunny (cruelty free).

See the ingredients for each of our cleaners in the "What's in Your Kit" section above.
["Light and sweet notes of iris flower and agave","Calming lavender paired with piney scent of eucalyptus","Bright refreshing smell of a sharp lemon"]

As described and more...
Review by Iris L. on 15 Aug 2020 review stating As described and more...
Being at home more during this pandemic and using more hand soap than usual, this makes me feel like I’m doing my part to reduce plastic use. They smell great and they foam just like popular store bought foaming hand soap.

Making my second order now...

5.0 star rating
08/15/20
Excellent
Review by Rebecca E. on 15 Aug 2020 review stating Excellent
I appreciate the concept of this company, to cut down on plastic usage. I also appreciate that they care about what ingredients they use in their products. This soap works well and ends up costing quite a bit less than the soap I was previously buying. My favorite scent is the lemon, followed by the lavender and then the iris. I am sensitive to scents, and the iris is the strongest scent to me. Will be getting two more starter sets for my other bathroom and my kitchen!
On Hand Soap Duo Refills Subscription
